entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
